decision:
In backend/kb/schemas.py, add WorkspaceMode enum with three values:
- NORMAL: for regular work  
- SANDBOX: for experimentation (isolated, temporary)
- JOURNAL: for private thoughts (no auto-analysis)

Also add WorkspaceMode to the __all__ export list at the bottom of the file.
